actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law

official_title: A bill to amend title 4 of the United States Code to limit the authority of any State or political subdivision to tax income of Federal employees who are not residents of such States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits any State or political subdivision of such State from imposing an income tax on any Federal officer or employee who is not a resident or domiciliary of such State or political subdivision.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 4 of the United States Code to limit the authority of any State or political subdivision to tax income of Federal employees who are not residents of such States, and for other purposes.
